name: OpenSearch
description: A collaboration platform for open-source projects. Opportunity Category Runner-Up of Garuda Hacks 2.0

name: Call-A-Borators
description: A collaborating tool for searching partners to build team for projects. Honorable Mention in Mile Zero Project Competition.

name: EduFun
description: Educational game platform with HOTS questions. Finalist of HackBiz 2021.

name: Mobilita Package Delivery
description: A CLI-based package delivery simulation game with implementation of various Abstract Data Types for IF2110 Class Project.

name: HarvestProlog
description: A farming simulation game made with Prolog for IF2121 Class Project.

name: Binjai Compressor
description: A website application for image compression made with Flask for IF2123 Class Project.

name: Matrix Calculator
description: A GUI-based implementation of linear algebra operations on matrices for IF2123 Class Project.
